page.title: 17Garnwen Farm-Nantyffyllon
page.content: In the village of{Nantyffyllon}Mr Jackie Thomas has a{farm.}It is called Garnwen farm. He has about 320{sheep and dips his sheep three times a year. The sheep have to be sheared in June. He has extra help from boys that he knows very well. After he shears the sheep he washes the wool and sends it to a farm in{Tondu.}The farm in Tondu sends it to the{Wool Marketing Board. In the Autumn Mr Thomas is going to have cattle for beef. He buys all his animals in{Cowbridge.}He rents out some of his fields for people who have horses. Mr Thomas also has cats and sheep dogs which are well trained. Mr Thomas is afraid of{chemicals}because they might harm the sheep and damage the soil. He has no gas and his{water {comes from under the mountains.}He does have mains electricity.
